channel.title: Panel on VoipSTACK
channel.description: Recent content in Panel on VoipSTACK

item.title: Operator Panel
item.description:
Effortless Operator Panel: Elevate Your VoIP Business

Experience a powerful, intuitive, and secure operator panel that simplifies how you manage and monitor VoIP services — all at no cost as part of our startup ecosystem.

item.title: (Panel) hangup active call
item.description:
Tutorial

The VoipSTACK Panel (VOIP Panel) is highly customizable and, by default, does not include any predefined actions. Let’s walk through how to create an action to hang up a call.

item.title: (Panel) transfer active call
item.description:
Tutorial

The VoipSTACK Panel (VOIP Panel) is highly customizable and, by default, does not include any predefined actions. Let’s walk through how to create an action to transfer a call.
